TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SmartLabelStyle extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于执行基于规则的数据点标签智能定位的方法和属性，以解决数据点标签重叠的问题。

span.span: Provides methods and properties used to perform intelligent, rule-based data point label positioning to resolve overlapping data point label issues.

summary.span: 获取或设置指示 算法是否启用的标志。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether a algorithm is enabled.

value.span: 如果将应用算法以防止数据点标签重叠，则为 。

span.span: if an algorithm will be applied to prevent data point labels from overlapping.

value.span: 如果不会禁止数据点标签的重叠，则为 。

span.span: if overlapping of data point labels will not be prevented.
The default value is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志指定是否允许点标签与点标记重叠。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that specifies whether the point labels are allowed to overlap a point marker.

value.span: 如果允许数据点标签与点标记重叠，则为 。

span.span: if data point labels are permitted to overlap point markers.

value.span: 如果禁止数据点标签与点标记重叠，则为 。

span.span: if data point labels will be prevented from overlapping the point markers.
The default value is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志指示是否将隐藏无法重新定位的重叠标签。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether overlapped labels that cannot be repositioned will be hidden.

value.span: 如果隐藏发生重叠的标签，则为 。

span.span: if labels will be hidden if they overlap.

value.span: 如果不会隐藏重叠的标签，则为 。

span.span: if overlapped labels will not be hidden.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果无法的属性指定的区域内绘制点和中所允许的方向, ，属性，并且此属性是`true`，将不绘制数据点标签。If the point cannot be drawn within the area specified by the properties and , in the directions allowed by the , property, and this property is `true`, the data point label will not be drawn. > [!NOTE] > 智能标签才起作用时属性设置为零。Smart labels only work when the property is set to zero.

summary.span: 获取或设置重叠的 对象可从标记移开的最大距离（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum distance, in pixels, that the overlapped object can be moved from the marker.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定以像素为单位的数据的最大距离情况下允许使用数据点标签移开重叠的点。This property specifies the maximum distance in pixels from the data point that data point labels are allowed to be moved in case of overlapping.

summary.span: 获取或设置重叠的 对象可移动的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction(s) in which the overlapped object is allowed to be moved.

value.span: 一个 枚举值或多个经过按位或计算的 值。

span.span: A enumeration value or multiple bitwise OR'd values.

value.span: 默认值是可在所有方向（到数据点中心的方向除外）上重新定位的所有 值的按位或。

span.span: The default is the bitwise OR of all values to allow repositioning in all directions except to the center of the data point.
